comment._content: it can also be written as "Mohamed Ali" pasha...(pasha is honorary title meaning lord) or "Muhammad Ali" the mosque is located in Salah Addin citadel in Cairo, Egypt. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mosque_of_Muhammad_Ali thnx for sharing
